word_mean: 脱落的：在成熟时脱落，通常指动物及人的乳牙列

sentence.Network_en: Overgrown deciduous shrubs can be cut back at this time of year.
sentence.Network_cn: 过于繁茂的落叶灌木可以在每年的这个时候修剪.

sentence.Network_en: Deciduous trees shed their leaves in autumn.
Fusions were common between strains from deciduous hosts or coniferous hosts.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自阔叶树或针叶树寄生的菌系间融合是普遍的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Although non - deciduous , olive trees do require cold period to go into semi dormancy ., 尽管是不落叶植物 , 橄榄树也需要一个半冬眠时期.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... promiscuous 滥交的，杂乱的 deciduous 脱落的，落叶的 assiduous 勤勉的，专心的.
验美国高中生英文水平的100个单词，你认识几个! ... circumnavigate 环航 deciduous 落叶的 deleterious 有毒的.
deciduousdeciduous 非永久性 , 每年落叶.

list.abs: 落叶树(Deciduous Tree) 是指在寒冷或干旱季节到来时，树叶同时枯死脱落的树种。 爱的叶子不选择它落下的地。
...,它们有常绿乔木(evergreen tree)和落叶乔木(deciduous tree)之分. ②灌木(shrub) 比较矮小,高在 5 米以下的树木,主干不明显,分枝.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... deciduate 有蜕膜的 deciduous tooth 乳齿 deciduous 脱落的.
石油英语词汇(D1) - 商务英语词汇 ... decibel scale 分贝刻度 deciduous forest 落叶林 deciliter 分升.
【摘要】目的：改良人蜕膜细胞（decidual cell)的培养方法，并对其进行特征鉴定，探讨蜕膜细胞的部分生物学特性。方法：取6～8周妊娠蜕膜组织，机械法分.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin deciduus (from decidere 'fall down or off') + -ous

entry.def: A deciduous tree or bush is one that loses its leaves in the autumn every year.

means.word_mean: 1. (of plants and shrubs) shedding foliage at the end of the growing season
2. (of teeth, antlers, etc.) being shed at the end of a period of growth;

auth_sentence.content: When they retreated, temperatures climbed and deciduous forest covered Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content: When they retreated, temperatures climbed and deciduous forest covered Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When they retreated, temperatures climbed and deciduous forest covered Europe.

auth_sentence.content: Larches are conifers, deciduous to be sure, but conifers nonetheless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Larches are conifers, deciduous to be sure, but conifers nonetheless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Larches are conifers, deciduous to be sure, but conifers nonetheless.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fall,表示"落下,降临"; 2. 引申为偶然发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偶然的;意外的;无意中的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accident[n.意外之事,灾害]+al……的→adj.偶然的;意外的;无意中的
de去掉+cid落+uous……的→使[树叶]掉下→落叶的
ac加强+cid落下,降临+ent→意外的掉下

stems_affixes.value_cn: 落下的方式, 影响范围
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+cid落下+ence表名词→掉下来的概率→发生事件的范围→影响范围
in进入+cid落下+ent→掉进来的事件
co共同+in进入+cid落下+e→共同落进

sentences.en: Deciduous trees shed their leaves in autumn.
Overgrown deciduous shrubs can be cut back at this time of year.
sentences.cn: 过于繁茂的落叶灌木可以在每年的这个时候修剪。
